attr.title: The Dead Prince
attr.desc: Play the role of a blood magic assassin fulfilling the pact his family made long ago. Use your assortment of magical abilities to sneak through bases, take down guards, and assassinate your target.
attr.inst:
Analog Sticks are required for this Game. Demo Game is included. But once you see how fun this game is and decide to buy it off STEAM from here, https://store.steampowered.com/app/1810530/The_Dead_Prince/
right click the game in your library and select 'Manage', then 'Browse Local Files' and copy all the game files into the 'assets" folder,
The game will have to patch, do some renaming and delete some things, so it may take a moment while on a black screen. Just be patient and the game will launch.
